Package com.example.trojanplanner

Class EventTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.trojanplanner.EventTest
public class EventTest extends Object
Unit tests for the Event class. This class includes tests for different functionalities and behaviors related to the Event class, such as recurring events, participant management, and status updates.

The tests in this class ensure that the logic for handling recurring events, adding/removing participants, checking waitlist status, and handling registration deadlines is working as expected.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventTest

      public EventTest()

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Setup method that initializes required fields before each test. It creates the necessary date objects, and sets up a test facility.

    • testDailyRecurringEventWithEndDateAndOccurrences

      public void testDailyRecurringEventWithEndDateAndOccurrences()
      Test case for checking the occurrence of a daily recurring event with end date and occurrences. Verifies that both the recurrence end date and total occurrences match for two different recurrence setups.

    • testAddAndRemoveParticipant

      public void testAddAndRemoveParticipant()
      Test case to add and remove a participant from the event's waiting list. Verifies that a participant can be added to and removed from the waiting list correctly.

    • testRecurringEventWithTotalOccurrences

      public void testRecurringEventWithTotalOccurrences()
      Test case for recurring event that specifies a total number of occurrences. Verifies that the event generates the correct number of occurrences.

    • testStatusUpdateBasedOnDates

      public void testStatusUpdateBasedOnDates()
      Test case for updating the event's status based on the current date. Verifies that the event status changes to "ongoing" when the current date is within the event's start and end time.

    • testIsWaitlistFull

      public void testIsWaitlistFull()
      Test case to check if the event's waitlist is full. Verifies that the event can correctly identify when the waitlist is full.

    • testIsRegistrationOpen

      public void testIsRegistrationOpen()
      Test case for checking if event registration is open based on the deadline. Verifies that the event can correctly determine whether registration is open or closed based on the current date.

    • testRecurringEventWithEndDate

      public void testRecurringEventWithEndDate()
      Test case for recurring events with a specified end date. Verifies that occurrences do not extend beyond the specified end date for recurring events.
